sn6.6:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava divaviharagato hoti patisallino.
sn6.6:1.3: Atha kho subrahma ca paccekabrahma suddhavaso ca paccekabrahma yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva paccekam dvarabaham upanissaya atthamsu. Atha kho subrahma paccekabrahma suddhavasam paccekabrahmanam etadavoca:
sn6.6:1.6: Asuko ca brahmaloko iddho ceva phito ca, brahma ca tatra pamadaviharam viharati.
sn6.6:1.7: Ayama, marisa, yena so brahmaloko tenupasankamissama; upasankamitva tam brahmanam samvejeyyama”ti.
sn6.6:1.8: “Evam, marisa”ti kho suddhavaso paccekabrahma subrahmuno paccekabrahmuno paccassosi.
sn6.6:2.1: Atha kho subrahma ca paccekabrahma suddhavaso ca paccekabrahma—seyyathapi nama balava puriso …pe… evameva—bhagavato purato antarahita tasmim brahmaloke paturahesum.
sn6.6:2.2: Addasa kho so brahma te brahmano duratova agacchante. Disvana te brahmano etadavoca:
sn6.6:2.4: “Agata kho mayam, marisa, amha tassa bhagavato santika arahato sammasambuddhassa.
sn6.6:2.5: Gaccheyyasi pana tvam, marisa, tassa bhagavato upatthanam arahato sammasambuddhassa”ti?
sn6.6:3.1: Evam vutto, kho so brahma tam vacanam anadhivasento sahassakkhattum attanam abhinimminitva subrahmanam paccekabrahmanam etadavoca:
sn6.6:3.2: “passasi me no tvam, marisa, evarupam iddhanubhavan”ti?
sn6.6:3.4: “So khvaham, marisa, evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavo kassa annassa samanassa va brahmanassa va upatthanam gamissami”ti?
sn6.6:4.1: Atha kho subrahma paccekabrahma dvisahassakkhattum attanam abhinimminitva tam brahmanam etadavoca:
sn6.6:4.2: “passasi me no tvam, marisa, evarupam iddhanubhavan”ti?
sn6.6:4.4: “Taya ca kho, marisa, maya ca sveva bhagava mahiddhikataro ceva mahanubhavataro ca.
sn6.6:4.5: Gaccheyyasi tvam, marisa, tassa bhagavato upatthanam arahato sammasambuddhassa”ti?
sn6.6:4.6: Atha kho so brahma subrahmanam paccekabrahmanam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn6.6:7.1: Atha kho subrahma ca paccekabrahma suddhavaso ca paccekabrahma tam brahmanam samvejetva tatthevantaradhayimsu.
sn6.6:7.2: Agamasi ca kho so brahma aparena samayena bhagavato upatthanam arahato sammasambuddhassati.
